title: Age Defense Serum
description: Specifically created for the concerns of the breakout-prone adult, Blemish + Age Defense goes beyond efficiently treating imperfections to also address signs of ageing.

title: Gel Cleanser
description: A foaming, tingling wash that cleanses without drying.Oils refresh and improve micro-circulation to aid in the elimination of toxins. African Aloe extract exhibits soothing properties.

title: Nourish Moisturiser
description: This intensely calming moisturiser combines probiotic extracts and prebiotic nutrients to boost barrier function for sensitive skin.

title: Body Butter
description: This a super-rich and creamy treat for your skin. It contains Community Fair Trade shea butter and has a delicious nutty scent.

title: MUSCLE MASSAGE OIL
description: A therapeutic muscle ease oil with de-stress actives.Deeply massage the specific area or body with warmed massage oil until fully absorbed.

title: Salt Lamp
description: Purifying the air this therapeutic lamp infuses a natural calm bringing the mind and body a sense of tranquillity and well being.

title: KALAHARI SALT SCRUB
description: A pure African Kalahari salt scrub for an all over body exfoliation.When exfoliating the feet or the desired body part.

title: Hydratonic Mist
description: A refreshing mist to complete the cleansing process activing that revitalise and improve skin condition.

title: Aloe Lip Butter
description: The lip butter is enhanced with Shea Butter and blended with Beeswax and jojoba oil, together   protecting, hydrating and softening your lips.

title: Hand Cream
description: Our Hand Cream is rich and moisturizing and will soothe and nourish hands that need that extra TLC.

title: Facial Cleansing Kit
description: 100ml Cleanser, 50ml Moisturiser and FREE 100ml Toner with 25% off Microfiber Cloth.Everything you need for clear skin..
